name: The Stuff Dreams Are Made Of
name_original: The Stuff Dreams Are Made Of
description:
Explore Oneiroi, an island of dreams, with renowned neuropsychiatrist Dr. Octavius Satterfield. His theories have helped millions have deeper, more satisfying, and more profound dream experiences. Together, you will journey into the metaphysical unknown to discover where the dreams ends, and you begin.

WASD+Mouse, Shift runs, space jumps

(This is a comedic walking simulator)

(Maybe don't go around trying to trigger all of the audio at once)

(Maybe just kind of piddle around and find the places where I've put audio clips)
